servinfo.title: DTC P0566 / P0567 / P0568: Cruise Control Off Signal / Resume Signal / Set Signal

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0565: Cruise Control On Signal .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: CANCEL switch signal voltage is lower than specified value for 40 seconds continuously
RES/ACC switch signal voltage is specified value for 120 seconds continuously
SET/COAST switch signal voltage is specified value for 120 seconds continuously

item.ptxt: Cruise control switch and/or its circuit

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, connect scan tool to DLC.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC.
Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 40 km/h (25 mph) or higher for 3 min. or more.

attention3.ptxt: Before this troubleshooting, read and observe Precautions for DTC Troubleshooting .

test1.ptxt: Check cruise control switch referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection .

testgroup.title: Cruise control command switch circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check for proper connection of cruise control switch circuit terminal to ECM connector.
If connections are OK, check the following for cruise command switch circuit.

item.ptxt: Resistance between “LT GRN” wire terminal and “BLK/YEL” wire terminal of cruise control switch connector are infinity (no continuity check)
Resistance between “LT GRN” wire terminal of cruise control switch connector and vehicle body ground is infinity (ground short check)

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
